name: The Good Boi
description:
The Good Boi

Get the cats in the dumpster in the allotted time. 

Use WASD or ↑←↓→  to move, SHIFT to sprint and SPACE to bork!

"The days of the farm are behind him, but that won’t stop Dogo from doing what he does best. He is going to be a good boy…

Help the neighborhood sleep by rounding up all of the noisy cats. Your bark is a mighty tool!

Herding cats ain’t easy, but somebody’s gotta do it!"

Ludum Dare 40 Compo game, made in 48h.  My first longer game jam.
